## InvoiceTotal interface

Contains price details from an invoice

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface InvoiceTotal 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [base\_grand\_total](./magento-api.invoicetotal.base_grand_total.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The final base grand total amount in the base currency |
|  [discounts?](./magento-api.invoicetotal.discounts.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[Discount](./magento-api.discount.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The applied discounts to the invoice |
|  [grand\_total](./magento-api.invoicetotal.grand_total.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The final total amount, including shipping, discounts, and taxes |
|  [shipping\_handling?](./magento-api.invoicetotal.shipping_handling.md) | Maybe&lt;[ShippingHandling](./magento-api.shippinghandling.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Contains details about the shipping and handling costs for the invoice |
|  [subtotal](./magento-api.invoicetotal.subtotal.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The subtotal of the invoice, excluding shipping, discounts, and taxes |
|  [taxes?](./magento-api.invoicetotal.taxes.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[TaxItem](./magento-api.taxitem.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The invoice tax details |
|  [total\_shipping](./magento-api.invoicetotal.total_shipping.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The shipping amount for the invoice |
|  [total\_tax](./magento-api.invoicetotal.total_tax.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The amount of tax applied to the invoice |
